name: Meth Capital
description:
The meth capital of the US is in great danger thanks to some straight edger that's killing people! Oh no! Will the hero and the 3 friends he found on Omegle save the day?

In this amazingly awful and edgy RPGMaker game, you can:

  • Get wasted
  • Fight like two fiends
  • Listen to very personal stories of people for no reason
  • Ride a boat to nowhere
  • See the broken shop system
  • Enter the drug dungeon

This is my first ever RPG Maker project. Like it or not. I'll make more serious stuff after this.
